data.eml:eml: Revision of the Western Palaearctic Diplazontinae (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Klopfstein, Seraina (2014): Revision of the Western Palaearctic Diplazontinae (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae). Zootaxa 3801 (1): 1-143, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3801.1.1
